availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Foster Mason (Caldwell Co Farmer and csa soldier (8th Ky Mtd Inf))

body.p: Caldwell County, Kentucky, farmer and soldier. Kentucky native. Son of Elisha Mason and Nancy Mason. Married to Caroline Mason. Father of Nancy Mason. Resident in Caldwell County, Kentucky, in 1850. Farmer in Princeton in 1860. Served in the 8th Kentucky Infantry Regiment (C.S.A.) as a private from October 21, 1861 to November 30, 1861

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Caldwell County, District 2, p. 391B.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Caldwell County, Princeton, p. 24.
Find A Grave, "Pvt Foster M Mason (1837-1861)," Memorial #67777165, http://www.findagrave.com/memorial/67777165 (accessed June 16, 2021).
